string.value: Do you really want to exit?

string.key: Tutorial 1 - jump around, make bubbles and enter the exit
string.value: Tutorial 1 - tilt your device to move. jump around, make bubbles and jump into the exit in the right corner above

string.key: Tutorial 2 - now it´s time to bubble a monster
string.value: Tutorial 2 - now it´s time to bubble a monster

string.key: Tutorial 3 - take the floating plattforms and enter the exit before the timelimit expires
string.value: Tutorial 3 - take the floating plattforms and enter the exit before the timelimit expires

string.key: Tutorial 4 - shoot your way to the exit
string.value: Tutorial 4 - shoot your way to the exit

string.key: Tutorial 5 - Ghosts will be redirected by bubbles and killed by fireballs
string.value: Tutorial 5 - Ghosts will be redirected by bubbles and killed by fireballs

string.key: Tutorial 6 - try to make a hattrick by hitting multiple bubbled monsters with a single jump
string.value: Tutorial 6 - try to make a hattrick by hitting multiple bubbled monsters with a single jump

string.key: Now have fun with bubblr :) Be carefull with the TimeLimit!
string.value: Now have fun with bubblr :) Be carefull with the TimeLimit!

string.key: beware for monsters coming from underneath
string.value: beware for monsters coming from underneath

string.key: beware for monsters escaping out of bubbles (they are getting faster)
string.value: beware for monsters escaping out of bubbles (they are getting faster)

string.key: sometimes you'll have to kill all the monsters to finish the level.
string.value: sometimes you'll have to kill all the monsters to finish the level.

string.key: sometimes it's enough to enter the exit
string.value: sometimes it's enough to enter the exit

string.key: sometimes you'll need a special weapon to blast away barriers that block the exit
string.value: sometimes you'll need a special weapon to blast away barriers that block the exit

string.value: try to kill multiple monsters with one jump ( > 1 = hattrick )

string.value: try to make bubbles before your last kill

string.value: Danke dass Du die bubblr DEMO gespielt hast!

string.key: Would you like to buy the full version?
Log in to Swarm to upload your highscore! Otherwise you will loose it!
string.value: Log Dich in Swarm ein, um Deinen Highscore hochzuladen! Ansonsten wirst Du Deinen Highscore verlieren!

string.key: Waiting for GEIST to finisch rocking ... (or press PLAY)
string.value: Warte darauf, dass GEIST zuende rockt ... (oder klick auf PLAY)

string.value: Dies wurde noch nicht implementiert (kommt bald)!

string.key: bubblr FULL Version is coming soon!
You didnt fullfill the mission! Sometimes it is necessary to do so! If you go to the next level, you cant go back and maybe have to start over!
string.value: Du hast die Mission nicht erfuellt! Manchmal ist das wichtig! Wenn Du weitermachst, kannst Du nicht mehr zurueck und musst spaeter evtl. von vorne starten!

string.key: Get achievements and compare your highscores with other players! Click 'YES' to enable highscores and ranking!
string.value: Verdiene Belohnungen und vergleiche Deine Punktezahl mit anderen Spielern! Klicke 'JA' um Highscores und Belohnungen einzuschalten!

string.key: Are you less than 18 years old or do you feel uncomfortable by rude language?
string.value: Bist Du unter 18 oder ist obszoene Sprache fuer Dich unangenehm?

string.key: Do you really want to exit?
Tutorial 1 - jump around, make bubbles and enter the exit
string.value: Tutorial 1 - neige Dein Handy zum Laufen. Spring herum, mach bubbles und spring in den exit oben rechts

string.key: Tutorial 2 - now it´s time to bubble a monster
string.value: Tutorial 2 - jetzt ist es zeit ein monster einzububbeln

string.key: Tutorial 3 - take the floating plattforms and enter the exit before the timelimit expires
string.value: Tutorial 3 - springe auf die Plattformen und gehe in den ausgang bevor die zeit ablaeuft

string.key: Tutorial 4 - shoot your way to the exit
string.value: Tutorial 4 - schiess dir den weg zum ausgang frei

string.key: Tutorial 5 - Ghosts will be redirected by bubbles and killed by fireballs
string.value: Tutorial 5 - Geister werden von bubbles umgelenkt und von Feuerbaellen neutralisiert

string.key: Tutorial 6 - try to make a hattrick by hitting multiple bubbled monsters with a single jump
string.value: Tutorial 6 - mache einen hattrick indem du mehrere eingebubbelte monster mit einem einzigen sprung erwischst

string.key: Now have fun with bubblr :) Be carefull with the TimeLimit!
string.value: Jetzt viel spass mit bubblr :) Pass auf das Zeit-Limit auf!

string.key: beware for monsters coming from underneath
string.value: Achte auf Monster, die von unten kommen

string.key: beware for monsters escaping out of bubbles (they are getting faster)
string.value: Achte auf Monster, die aus Bubbles entkommen (sie werden schneller)

string.key: sometimes you'll have to kill all the monsters to finish the level.
string.value: Manchmal musst Du alle Monster toeten, um den Level zu beenden.

string.key: sometimes it's enough to enter the exit
string.value: Manchmal reicht es aus in den Exit zu gehen.

string.key: sometimes you'll need a special weapon to blast away barriers that block the exit
string.value: Manchmal brauchst Du eine Spezialwaffe, um Dir den Weg zum Exit frei zu schiessen.

string.key: try to kill multiple monsters with one jump ( > 1 = hattrick )
string.value: versuche mehrere Monster mit einem Sprung zu erwischen ( > 1 = hattrick )

string.key: try to make bubbles before your last kill
string.value: erzeuge Bubbles vor dem letzten Kill

string.key: try to make bubbles before you enter the exit
string.value: erzeuge Bubbles bevor Du in den Exit gehst

string.key: try to 'kiss' monsters (kill on extreme short distance)
string.value: versuche Monster zu 'kuessen' (kill auf sehr kurze Distanz)

languages.language: !!! Screen in game - what do you men by floating ?
